keywords.value: A Ride on the Irish Cream (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Erin Markey, whose new play is about to open at the Abrons Arts Center, has developed a cult following through performances that mix humor, songs and storytelling.

headline.print_headline: Try to Pin Her Down. It’s Futile.
headline.main: A ‘Barbie From Outer Space’ Touches Down on a New Stage

snippet: Erin Markey, whose new play is about to open at the Abrons Arts Center, has developed a cult following through performances that mix humor, songs and storytelling.
abstract: Profile of Erin Markey, unconventional actress starring in musical A Ride on the Irish Cream, work she created as memoir to her Michigan childhood; Markey comments that acting is all in the subtleties, demonstrating skepticism, sensuality and other emotions using her distinctive blue eyes.
